title: Thomas Tuchel - Wikipedia
snippet: On 24 March 2023, Tuchel was announced as head coach at Bayern Munich on a two-year deal, replacing his former player Julian Nagelsmann, who was dismissed. Tuchel was presented at a club press conference the following day, where he said "the squad assembled [here] is one of the most talented ...

title: Bayern Munich Celebrates Tuchel’s Appointment: Set to Save Millions | beIN SPORTS
snippet: Bayern Munich will save approximately $5.3 million (5 million euros) from the contract that remained with Thomas Tuchel, who has now been appointed as the new head coach of England’s national football team.

title: Thomas Tuchel: News & profile - FC Bayern München
snippet: Thomas Tuchel (born 29 August 1973) has been the coach of FC Bayern since 24 March 2023. Info, titles & news - you can find everything here!

title: Thomas Tuchel replaces Julian Nagelsmann as Bayern Munich head coach | Bundesliga
snippet: Thomas Tuchel (l.) is the new Bayern Munich head coach, replacing Julian Nagelsmann.

title: Thomas Tuchel is officially unveiled as Bayern Munich's new manager| All Football
snippet: Thomas Tuchel has boldly targeted winning a treble with Bayern Munich this season after he was unveiled as the club's new manager following the sacking of Julian Nagelsmann. The German was appointed as Bayern head coach on Friday after they ruthlessly sacked Nagelsmann.
